item.title: 中国审查普华永道在恒大 780 亿美元欺诈案中的角色
item.description: 在中国恒大集团被指控诈骗 780 亿美元后，中国当局正在审查普华永道会计师事务所在该集团会计实务中的作用，从而加大了对这家全球会计巨头的压力。【原文：Chinese authorities are examining the role of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP in China Evergrande Group’s accounting practices after the developer was accused of a $78 billion fraud, ramping up pressure on the global accounting giant that audited a slew of developers before the sector’s meltdown.】

item.title: 健康连锁店 Auna 首次公开募股融资 3.6 亿美元，定价低于发行区间
item.description: Auna SA 是一家业务遍及拉丁美洲的医疗保健服务提供商，在美国首次公开发行股票时，股票定价低于市场定价范围，共募集资金 3.6 亿美元。【原文：Auna SA, a health-care services provider with operations across Latin America, raised $360 million in its US initial public offering after pricing shares below a marketed range.】

item.title: 美国放松制裁后，中国石油将收购委内瑞拉石油
item.description: 在美国去年底取消对欧佩克产油国的制裁后，中国石油天然气股份有限公司（PetroChina Co.【原文：PetroChina Co. is set to receive a cargo of Venezuelan oil, which will be used at its mega refinery in Guangdong, after the US rolled back sanctions on the OPEC producer late last year.】

item.title: 石油需求超预期，原油峰值计算面临考验
item.description: 全世界的石油使用量比以往任何时候都要多，今年的需求量再次超出预期，这让人怀疑全球石油消耗量将在多长时间内达到顶峰。【原文：The world is using more oil than ever and demand is outpacing expectations again this year, raising questions about how soon global consumption will peak.】

item.title: 大宗交易中的小盘股路线削弱印度股票交易量
item.description: 印度的股票交易量已降至 12 月以来的最低水平，原因是小型公司股票的抛售减缓了散户投资者涌入印度这个 4.3 万亿美元市场的速度，即便是在机构抢购大型交易的情况下也是如此。【原文：Equity trading volumes in India have fallen to the lowest level since December as the selloff in shares of smaller companies slows the rush of retail investors into the nation’s $4.3 trillion market, even as institutions snap up large deals.】

item.title: 班克斯科州长称未来削减措施将逐一评估
item.description: 墨西哥中央银行行长维多利亚-罗德里格斯-塞哈（Victoria Rodriguez Ceja）在决策者决定自 2021 年以来首次降低利率后接受采访时说，墨西哥未来对借贷成本的调整将是渐进的，并将逐次进行评估。【原文：Future adjustments to borrowing costs in Mexico will be gradual and evaluated one at a time, Central Bank Governor Victoria Rodriguez Ceja said in an interview following policymakers’ decision to lower the rate for the first time since 2021.】

item.title: 中国大型 CEO 峰会因政策和准入方面的疑虑而蒙上阴影
item.description: 本周末，中国将在北京举行的年度论坛上向全球高层管理者抛出橄榄枝，而关于他们将与哪些高层领导人会面的猜测，已经给论坛蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：China’s bid to woo top global executives at an annual forum in Beijing this weekend is already being clouded by speculation over which top leaders they’ll meet.】

item.title: 中国人民币在突破关键水平后跌至四个月低点
item.description: 在岸人民币跌至四个月来最弱，突破了一个密切关注的技术水平，而中国政府数月来一直在努力将有管理的货币保持在一个狭窄的区间内。【原文：The onshore yuan fell to its weakest in four months, breaching a closely-watched technical level after a months-long effort by Chinese authorities to keep the managed currency in a narrow range.】

item.title: 双重上市计划削弱收购猜测，森马下滑
item.description: Samsonite International SA 下跌，原因是这家箱包生产商寻求第二次上市的计划有可能损害全球收购公司的收购希望。【原文：Samsonite International SA dropped as the luggage maker’s plans to pursue a second listing risks hurting hopes for a takeover from global buyout firms.】

item.title: 碧桂园、万科暴露中国房地产危机的严重性
item.description: 碧桂园控股有限公司和中国万科集团股份有限公司下周的财报将显示中国房地产问题对世界第二大经济体的伤害程度。【原文：Earnings from Country Garden Holdings Co. and China Vanke Co. next week should indicate the extent to which China’s property woes are hurting the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。一些央行开始不再害怕通货膨胀。投资者在 Reddit 上赚得盆满钵满。监管机构再次将目光瞄准苹果公司。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Some central banks are getting less scared of inflation. Investors are making lots of money on Reddit. And regulators are training their sights on Apple once again. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 印度板球联赛回归掀起为期两个月的消费热潮
item.description: 在这个世界上人口最多的国家举办板球世界杯赛数月后，世界上最赚钱的板球比赛在印度开赛，这为投资者提供了又一个在这项运动中套现的大好机会。【原文：The start of the world’s most lucrative cricket tournament in India is presenting investors with another big opportunity to cash in on the sport, months after the world’s most populous nation hosted the Cricket World Cup.】

item.title: 利率和地缘政治主导石油市场，两日下跌后趋于平稳
item.description: 石油连续两日下跌，交易商对全球利率前景和中东地缘政治紧张局势进行了评估。【原文：Oil held a two-day drop, with traders assessing the outlook for global interest rates and geopolitical tensions in the Middle East.】

item.title: 绩优日本基金在日本央行加息更多的情况下看好银行
item.description: 埃瓦利奇资产管理公司（Evarich Asset Management）的日本基金今年以来击败了 96% 的同行，在日本央行结束负利率后，该公司正考虑增持日本贷款公司和建筑公司的股份。【原文：Evarich Asset Management, whose Japan-focused fund has beaten 96% of its peers this year, is considering increasings its stakes in the nation’s lenders and construction companies after the central bank ended negative interest rates.】

item.title: SQM 加倍看好锂市场繁荣，同行纷纷采取防御措施
item.description: 在智利阿塔卡马沙漠边缘，世界上最大的锂精炼厂之一即将变得更大。【原文：On the edge of Chile’s Atacama Desert, one of the world’s biggest lithium refineries is about to get a lot bigger.】

item.title: 前瑞士信贷客户因向国税局藏匿资金而被起诉
item.description: 一名巴西裔美国商人在佛罗里达州被起诉，涉嫌利用瑞士信贷集团、瑞银集团和其他瑞士银行，在 35 年时间里向美国税务机关隐藏了 2,000 多万美元的资产。【原文：A Brazilian-American businessman was indicted in Florida for allegedly using Credit Suisse Group AG, UBS Group AG and other Swiss banks to hide more than $20 million in assets from US tax authorities over 35 years.】

item.title: 亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一，美国股市再创新高：市场综述
item.description: 周五亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一，这表明投资者正在重新审视上一交易日推动亚洲股市走高的乐观情绪，因为美国出现了持续通胀的新迹象。【原文：Equities in Asia headed for a mixed open Friday in a sign investors are rethinking the optimism that propelled the region’s shares higher in the prior session, as fresh signs of persistent inflation appeared in the US.】

item.title: 比特币将创数月来最差一周，ETF 需求疲软
item.description: 比特币从历史高点回落了10%以上，因为对刚刚起步的现货比特币交易所交易基金的需求连续第三天萎缩。摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase and Co.【原文：Bitcoin has peeled back more than 10% from its all-time high as the appetite for fledgling spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds contracted for a third day. JPMorgan Chase and Co. warns the retreat has room to deepen.】

item.title: 西班牙监管机构称 Grifols 财务无重大错误
item.description: 西班牙证券监管机构表示，他们在 Grifols SA 的财务报告中没有发现任何重大错误，但这家制药公司的某些数据确实存在缺陷。【原文：Spanish securities regulators said they didn’t find any big mistakes in Grifols SA’s financial reports, though the pharmaceutical company does have some deficiencies in certain figures.】

item.title: 激进派 Starboard Value 提名阿尔冈昆公司董事
item.description: 知情人士透露，Starboard Value 已提名三名候选人加入加拿大公用事业公司 Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp.【原文：Starboard Value has nominated three candidates to join the board of Canadian utility Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp., people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Truist Insurance 开始为 LBO 出售 27.5 亿美元的垃圾债券
item.description: 由摩根士丹利牵头的一组债务安排人启动了 27.5 亿美元高收益债券的营销活动，该债券将支持 Stone Point Capital 和 Clayton Dubilier & Rice 收购 Truist Financial Corp.【原文：A group of debt arrangers led by Morgan Stanley kicked off marketing on a $2.75 billion high-yield bond that will support Stone Point Capital and Clayton Dubilier & Rice’s acquisition of Truist Financial Corp.’s insurance business.】

item.title: 加拿大 S&P/TSX 综合指数创收盘新高
item.description: 在银行股、大宗商品价格飙升以及该国不断增长的科技行业反弹的支撑下，加拿大股票基准指数周四收盘创下历史新高。【原文：Canada’s equities benchmark index closed at a new all-time high Thursday on the backs of bank stocks, surging commodity prices and a rally in the country’s growing tech sector.】

item.title: 美联储开始变得比某些同行更鹰派，美元跳涨
item.description: 在瑞士国家银行出乎投资者意料地降息后，美元创下了一个多月来的最大涨幅，而交易商也加大了对英国央行也将放宽政策的押注。【原文：The dollar jumped the most in over a month after the Swiss National Bank surprised investors by cutting interest rates, while traders boosted bets that the Bank of England will ease policy as well.】

item.title: 欧盟将对俄罗斯谷物征收惩罚性关税
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，欧盟最早将于本周五提议对进口的部分俄罗斯农产品征收惩罚性关税，此举将几乎停止运往欧盟的受限产品的贸易。【原文：The European Union is set to propose punitive tariffs on the imports of some Russian agricultural products as early as Friday, a move that should all but halt trade of the restricted items destined for the bloc, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝莱德称得克萨斯州 "鲁莽 "撤资对学校不利
item.description: 贝莱德公司批评得克萨斯州决定从该资产管理公司的基金中剥离 85 亿美元，称此举 "鲁莽"，不利于该州学校和家庭的财务状况。【原文：BlackRock Inc. criticized Texas’s decision to divest $8.5 billion from the asset manager’s funds, calling the move “reckless” and detrimental to the finances of the state’s schools and families.】

item.title: 墨西哥自 2021 年以来首次下调关键利率
item.description: 墨西哥央行作出了一项分裂性的降息决定，加入了因通胀放缓而放宽货币政策的地区同行行列。【原文：Mexico’s central bank cut interest rates in a split decision, joining regional peers that have been easing monetary policy as inflation slows.】

item.title: 美国新法案针对共同基金对中国企业的投资
item.description: 根据美国国会的一项新法案，美国共同基金将不能投资于某些跟踪中国股票指数的产品。【原文：US mutual funds wouldn’t be able to invest in some products that track Chinese stock indexes under a new bill in Congress.】

item.title: 资产出售计划有望实现，Enel 债务降至 600 亿欧元
item.description: 意大利公用事业公司 Enel SpA 实现了削减债务的目标，并表示一项雄心勃勃的资产出售计划即将完成。【原文：Italian multi-utility Enel SpA met its debt-cutting targets and said that an ambitious asset-sales plan is close to completion.】

item.title: Reddit 在最高价 IPO 中募集 7.48 亿美元后上涨 38
item.description: 在这家社交媒体公司及其股东以市场定价区间的最高价募集到 7.48 亿美元后，Reddit 公司的股价较其首次公开发行价大涨了 38%，发出了一个强烈的信号：美国 IPO 的窗口正在重新打开。【原文：Reddit Inc. shares jumped 38% over their initial public offering price after the social media company and its shareholders raised $748 million priced at the top of a marketed range, sending a strong signal that the window for US IPOs is reopening.】
